queries.name: Запрос погоды для Moscow
queries.query: query { getWeather(city: "Moscow") { city temperature description humidity wind_speed coordinates { lat lon } } }

queries.name: Запрос прогноза для London
queries.query: query { getForecast(city: "London") { city country forecast { date avgTemp minTemp maxTemp description } } }

queries.name: Поиск городов
queries.query: query { searchCities(query: "Paris") { name country lat lon } }

queries.name: История запросов
queries.query: query { getHistory(page: 1, limit: 5) { data { city temperature description date } pagination { total pages page limit } } }

queries.name: Статистика города
queries.query: query { getCityStats(city: "Berlin", days: 7) { avgTemp maxTemp minTemp avgHumidity totalRequests mostCommonDescription } }

queries.name: Тренды города
queries.query: query { getCityTrends(city: "New York", days: 7) { date avgTemp maxTemp minTemp } }

queries.name: Погода по координатам
queries.query: query { getWeatherByCoords(lat: 55.7558, lon: 37.6173) { city temperature description coordinates { lat lon } } }
